verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy is the Lamb, To receive power and riches and Wisdom and might and honor. Blessing and honor and glory And dominion forever, Worthy is the Lamb.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Brothers) Power (Sisters) Power (Brothers) Riches (Sisters) Riches Wisdom and might and Blessing and honor and Dominion forevermore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Brothers) Power (Sisters) Power (Brothers) Riches (Sisters) Riches Wisdom and might and Blessing and honor Worthy is the Lamb.{/lang-eng}
